eu_initiatives: Road safety; sustainable transport; air quality; cycling; walking. Specifically, we are currently looking to respond to EC consultation on General and Pedestrian Safety Regulations.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Brake is a road safety charity working with communities and organisations across the UK to stop the tragedy of road deaths and injuries, make streets and communities safer for everyone, and support people bereaved and seriously injured on roads. We also work in New Zealand and run global projects.
relevant_communication: We are involved in campaigning in the UK and overseas in relation to improving road safety, promoting sustainable transport and a better environment. This activity includes meeting MPs, holding events, speaking opportunities, writing joint letters to industry, issuing proactive media releases and reports on relevant topics.
